faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the login page, and fill in your details.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password.' Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: How do I customize the theme?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Settings page and explore the Theme Customization section.

faqs.question: What should I do if I encounter an error?
faqs.answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact support using the form below.

documentation.description: Download our user guide for detailed instructions.
